storyInfo: Breaking through the enemy line with her patient in tow, Outcast comes upon Bagpipe, who is also fighting the Dublinns. The two immediately hit it off, and Outcast decides to entrust her patient to Bagpipe, to go find Jane and her friends while she sacrifices herself.

attributes.content: I got a report that you spotted a white-haired girl with horns here?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: I'm not sure it's the one you're looking for.
attributes.name: Timid Youth

attributes.content: Speak.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: She's really hurt, right? As in, there's a huge hole through her chest and stomach—
attributes.name: Timid Youth

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: A gray-haired Sankta came and carried her away. God, her blood spilled all over the place. It was horrifying!
attributes.name: Timid Youth

attributes.content: A Sankta? Are you sure?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: I guarantee you I saw a Sankta. Not a whole lot of them here in County Hillock. If it weren't for the glowing halo on her head, I wouldn't have seen her in the dark.
attributes.name: Timid Youth

attributes.content: Where did they go?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: In that last house there, upstairs. The one with the broken window. She was running up a storm and jumped straight inside.
attributes.name: Timid Youth

attributes.content: Over there? She's that close?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: P8, R3, this is B9—What were you two doing?! The target's in this district!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Your team should have already searched every last house on this street an hour ago. How come I haven't heard from you?!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: What's the funny idea? I'm not getting a peep from you! P8, R3, answer immediately!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Dia ár sábháil!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Do you need me for anything else, sir? If not, I'll be on my way. And, um, I would appreciate those bandages you promised...
attributes.name: Timid Youth

attributes.content: Bandages?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: You won't need them.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: W—What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Timid Youth

attributes.content: Orders from the heads. You've got no one to blame but yourself for seeing what you shouldn't have—
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Aaarghhh!
attributes.name: Timid Youth

attributes.content: Who are you?!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Is that what they do these days? Give names before you fight?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: *Whimpers*... Ugh... T-That almost blew my brains out...
attributes.name: Timid Youth

attributes.content: You'd better get goin'. I'll take care of this baddie for you.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Th... Thank you...
attributes.name: Timid Youth

attributes.content: No need to thank me. All in a day's work.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Piledriver spear... A Victorian!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Quick, tell 'The Bandit'! There are still Victorian remnants in the area!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: 'The Bandit'? Do all of the spectre force have names that embarrassin'?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I think I just beat up a few screamin' about some boss person called 'The Convict...'
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You took down everyone at P8...? Just... you alone?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: There were thirty of them!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Well, they were facin' the Victorian Army—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ant it doesn't change a thing just 'cause I'm here alone.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Form up! Surround her! She's on her own!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Formation again? Well, you've got it together, don't you!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Hold the line and press forward! Watch each other's backs!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: And watch that lance charge too! Don't take her on one-on-one!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Oh? Pilin' numbers up to take me down?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Don't you underestimate—my spear!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Aaaaugh! What the-?!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: This Vouivre's too strong! She can down two in one strike! Send the heavy defenders! Everyone else, fall back! Get word to the leaders—
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Oh, stick around!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Last one!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Bloody hell, the armor's like paper to her!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Fall back! It's now or never!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Huh? Flyin' away on me?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Did you steal our steam jetpacks? Or is it flyin' machines from off foreign?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: This lot have a different combat style than the first ones we fought. There's no figurin' this spectre force, is there?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I wish Triangle were here. My spear can't reach anywhere near that high—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: They're droppin'?! Is there a crossbowman around? No, those aren't bolts. Are those... stones?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Gosh, that's definitely no crossbow—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Carrying the unconscious patient with one arm, Outcast steps out of an empty house on the side of the street.
Was that you just now? Thanks for the help!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No need to thank me. You saved my ass too, after all.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I've always heard how good Sankta are with guns, but I never knew you could fling a rock so well!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Aha, sorry, little lady, my gunplay tends to draw a crowd.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Right. You don't hear gunfire every day around here.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Is your mate hurt? She doesn't seem so good.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: She was hit during the shelling around noon.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Sorry about that... We almost could've stopped that assault. It was a huge mistake, especially with all this innocent folk dragged into the mess.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ugh, no sense sayin' it now. I'm just tryin' to save as many as I can.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Are these hostiles here for you?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I reckon so.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I saw them huntin' the locals. I'm in a hurry, but I just couldn't stand by and watch that happen.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: They'll pay.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Whoa! I just heard 'em say they lost contact with two squads. I ran into one of them, but was the other one your handiwork?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Fine job!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You're mighty fine yourself.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: But the enemy's got more than just the few squads. They have an entire army, and there's more and more of 'em pourin' into the city since the afternoon. It's gonna be hard to hold County Hillock.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: If you aren't a local, you'd better take your pal and leave the city now.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: We've got hostiles watchin' the alleyways. Looks like you'll have to leave the other way—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Or they're all blocked?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: How could there be so much debris in one city?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Well, they aren't here yet. I'll help you take care of what's blockin' the passageway out back first—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You're not going to retreat?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I'm not retreatin', no.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'll make my way through the city and regroup with my teammates.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Through the whole city? Crawling with enemies? With most roads cut off by debris?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Good thing I'm already halfway through, eh?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You're all alone, taking them by yourself, and you ain't scared one bit.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Scared? The battlefield's never scared me.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I am pretty worried, though.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I've never seen... a Victorian city in this kind of shape.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Lingones used to be a massive metropolis, many years ago. You could call it the capital of the world. But Victoria and its allies decided to burn it all down. One of man's greatest cities reduced to a raging inferno. It was a hundred times worse than this, believe you me.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Right. Our textbooks make us winnin' the Battle of the Four Emperors seem so glorious. The more glory they paint on, the crueler they are to the Gauls, even.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Victoria's done a lot of terrible things in the past...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: It's not until the flames of war are lickin' at your home that you really feel just how painful it is.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: We're almost done. Just these fallen columns left—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'll help you.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Thanks! We just need to push it to the side.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ugh. One column goes down, and it might just bring another with it.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (Quiet mutter) Who knows what the future holds...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No one knows where Victoria might go until the moment it gets there.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Sorry, I just can't stop thinkin' about all that. You shouldn't be helpin' move columns while you've got that lass on your back there.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The job gets done faster when we work together.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Right, if we all work together, there's still a chance things could take a turn for the better, eh?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Haha, look at me blatherin' on and on about this stuff. What's the difference, even, if we lose the chance? What's so bad about things gettin' worse?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Even if your home's torn apart, does that mean it's not home anymore? You go enrich the soil again with your own hands. Isn't that what all the folk who live here should be doin'?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Phew... Last one!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: And the road's clear—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (Quick, the signal B9 sent's down this alleyway!)
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: (There's debris blocking the way out the back, but send a team around just to be safe!)
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: (The rest of you, stay and watch the entrance. Don't let anyone out. Our command will be here soon—)
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: There's more of them!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'll hold it here, Lass. Take your pal and get runnin'.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: That's gonna be difficult, kiddo.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You heard what they said, didn't you? Their leaders are coming, and I'm not expecting pushovers like we just fought.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: That's all the more reason you should go, isn't it?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I guess I didn't say it yet—
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I'm not one to run from a fight.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Come, my young friend, give me a hand—
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Outcast transfers the patient in her embrace to Bagpipe.
Whoa, that's heavy! Is she really a Vouivre?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Hah, not very polite to call a girl heavy.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Huff... Ugh... I doubt anyone else would be able to carry her.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Good thing I have a Vouivre friend, then. She's about your age, and a fairly tough warrior, too.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I want you to take the patient to the east side of the statue and hand her over to my friends.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Tell them I'm sorry I can't keep my promise. They'll know what to do from there.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'm gonna stay a little longer. Got somebody to wait up for.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Is she in here?
attributes.name: 'The Elocutionist

attributes.content: Uh, yes, sir. Uh, the other officers are here, too?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: The intel says there are only three of them... and one of them is both heavily injured and unconscious.
attributes.name: 'The Accountant

attributes.content: In the case, wouldn't just one of you be more than enough to deal with them?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Two of them took down three squads, and without so much as a scratch.
attributes.name: 'The Accountant

attributes.content: Are you telling me how worthless you all are, or does the mission matter so little that you don't mind messing up again and again?
attributes.name: 'The Accountant

attributes.content: No... I wouldn't dare...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Huff... Huff... Are they really that tough?
attributes.name: 'The Convict

attributes.content: At the very least, they're formidable enough that you're up and awake.
attributes.name: 'The Elocutionist

attributes.content: It doesn't hurt to be a little cautious. Don't forget, we have both the unidentified Sankta and Victorian soldier, and she's there with them, too.
attributes.name: 'The Accountant

attributes.content: You know what she can do when she's pushed to the brink, don't you?
attributes.name: 'The Accountant

attributes.content: Huff... I'm starting to look forward to this.
attributes.name: 'The Convict

attributes.content: The enemy's... got reinforcements!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Leader! This is Bagpipe, callin' Leader—!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Still not gettin' a signal... Argh! I need to get this girl over there right now...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Severely Infected

attributes.content: Huh... You're awake?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No. No...
attributes.name: Severely Infected

attributes.content: Still asleep... but why's she strugglin' all of a sudden? Is she having a bad dream?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.text: Bagpipe looks up, as though she feels something.
A few faint silhouettes look down at the commotion from atop a tall building nearby.
A young soldier who had just passed lies on the ground. The purple flames in his lifeless eyes look as though they could surge out at any moment.
She looks back down the street to see yet more hostiles approaching.

attributes.content: It's almost time.
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: The enemy's gathering over there. We can't stay much longer.
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: Let's give her a bit more time, Shredder. You know Outcast's always punctual.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: Look! Over there! That's two individuals, incoming!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Outcast, we're over here!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Out—No, it's not her. Who's that running this way...?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Bagpipe?!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Huh? So you're the cool Sankta lass's friend?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: That's perfect, then. Come, this girl's your pal too, right? She's heavily injured. The Sankta lass told me to bring her to you—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Outcast...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Where is she?! Did something happen to her?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: She seemed like she was doin' alright when we parted ways...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Not sure why, but she told me to apologize to you for her. Said she can't keep her promise, and that you'd know what to do from here.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Then that must mean...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: She said it herself. We have to be sure we're safe before we help anyone else!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Because that's how we save... even more...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: No—!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Jane! Don't go after her!
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: The Lass said it. We know what to do from here.
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: Aye, I agree with him.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Do you trust her? I only met her the once, but I trust in her.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I reckon I knocked out some two dozen on my way here with this girl. Not sure if any of them are chasin' after us.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The soldiers themselves aren't much of an issue, but if we run into their Caster leader... There's no tellin' how powerful she actually is.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: So, take your friend, and get out of here.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: What's that flash?!
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: An explosion?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No, can't be. There's not a bomb out there with a flash this bright. Leastwise, not one we'd live through!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: So it's Arts?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: But usin' Arts to your extreme in such a short period of time, the Caster herself would...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The blaze... the light... it blew through the clouds...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Did... the rain stop?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: That fire's from the west... Is it the alley from just now?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: If it wasn't for the direction, I would've thought it was bright out already...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: ...Right...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: The sky's... all bright.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: None of them says another word.
The flames, kindling the skies, are still burning bright—
A raging fury that portends the impending end of the darkness above, or perhaps a shining beacon that impresses the brilliance of life on those aiding each other below.
That's the most stunnin' daybreak I've seen...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No wonder she said it'd draw a crowd, haha...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Jane...
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: Huff... puff... I'm okay.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Shredder, is it time?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: It is...
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: Let Uncle Oliver know... we got her.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: —Someone seriously infected.
attributes.name: Janie
